mapper.select: SELECT name, id, pw, emailId, emailAddress, tel, gender, agree, regidate FROM membership WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership(name, id, pw, emailId, emailAddress, tel, gender, agree, regidate) VALUES (#{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{emailId}, #{emailAddress}, #{tel}, #{gender}, #{agree}, NOW())
